title.en: Italy imposed a ban on flights from China

title.pt: Em todos os aeroportos italianos instituidas inspecções sanitárias em todos os passageiros vindos fora de Itália
title.en: Health screening procedures at all Italian airports of passengers coming from abroad

title.pt: Quarentena instituida em 11 municípios, na Lombardia e em Veneto
title.en: Quarantine restrictions in 11 Municipalities, in Lombardy and Veneto

title.pt: Território italiano dividido em 3 zonas-niveis de restrições: vermelho toda a pop. em quarentena - Lombardia, amarelo eventos sociais e desportivos cancelados, e restante territorio com medidas de prevenção e sanitização nos transportes públicos
title.en: Italian national territory was divided into three areas: A red zone where the whole population is in quarantine , a yellow zone (composed of the regions of Lombardy, Veneto and Emilia-Romagna), where social and sport events are suspended and schools, theatres, clubs and cinemas are closed. The rest of the national territory, where safety and prevention measures are advertised in public places and special sanitisations are performed on means of public transport.

title.pt: Todos os eventos desportivos em Itália a realizar à porta fechada
title.en: All italian sporting events to be played at closed doors

title.pt: Itália encerra todas as escolas e universidades
Itália ordena quarentena em toda a Lombardia e outras 14 provincias em Piemonte, Veneto, Emilia-Romagna e Marche
title.en: Italy orders all Lombardi and fourteen provinces in Piedmont, Veneto, Emilia-Romagna, and Marche under forced quarantine

title.pt: Todo o desporto suspenso em Itália
title.en: All sport in Italy suspended because of outbreak

title.pt: British Airways, easyJet e Ryanair cancelam todos os vôos de e para Itália
title.en: British Airways, easyJet and Ryanair cancelled all flights to and from Italy

title.pt: Itália coloca todo o pais em isolamento social
title.en: Italy puts the entire country under social isolation

title.pt: Itália encerra todo o comércio não essencial
Itália bane todos os desportos ao ar livre, e todos os parques instruidos a encerrar
title.en: Italy banned open-air sports and running. Parks, playgrounds and public green were closed down. Movement across the country was further restricted, by banning "any movement towards a residence different from the main one"

title.pt: Exército Italiano chamado a auxiliar o cumprimento do bloqueio
title.en: Italian army called to enforced lockdown

title.pt: Testes COVID em Itália atingem os 206 mil
title.en: Italy total COVID tests performed reaches 206 k (3499 tests per 1 million habitants)

title.pt: Itália ordena todas os negócios a encerrar todas as actividades não essenciais
title.en: Italy orders businesses to close all operations “non-essential production activities”

title.pt: Itália decreta sancções pesadas para infractores das medidas de quarentena
title.en: Italy decrees heavy penalties for infractors of quarentine measures
